#summary Roadmap of items to work on in the future

= Roadmap =

At current there are very few things on the roadmap for this project as it is relatively self-contained. However
as time permits, we will attempt to resolve the remaining issues (or close them if we cannot verify or get
further input). Additionally, below are some of the goals for the next version. 

== 0.5 ==

  * Update main gwt-syncproxy project to use Java Generics
  * Fix some non-critical warnings in the source code throughout the project
  * Modify the system as needed when GWT 2.6 releases towards the end of this year (see gwtproject.com or the 2013 IO Presentation on the GWT Roadmap)
  * Update the Android library portion of this project to comply with the new Android Studio (if possible)
  * Mavenize
  * Cleanup unused tests dev files
  * Increase testing Code Coverage to > 95% (currently approx 70% for gwt-syncproxy src)
  * Change download section to Google Drive in compliance with [http://google-opensource.blogspot.com/2013/05/a-change-to-google-code-download-service.html]
